Betreff: Re: [junit] auto-run testXYZ-Methods


You can do t=
his by using a constructor of the TestSuite class.  "new
TestSuite(MyTestCa=
se.class)" will construct a suite with all of the public
void testXYZ metho=
ds of MyTestCase.  If a TestCase class doesn't have its
own suite() method,=
 just typing its name into the runner's textfield will
have the same effect=
.

---------------------------------------------------------------------_->=



Yes, this was it! Thanx a lot ...

          Wolfgang
